Tools I use.

Software

  • Mobbin for design research and inspiration.
  • Figma to design.
  • Framer to build landing pages.
  • Webflow to build more complex websites.
  • Circle to run DesignerMindeset.net community.
  • Hypefury and Typefully for X management.
  • Notion when I have to.
  • Typeform to create forms.
